cookies.title: Cookies on Project Application and Funding Service
cookies.heading: Cookies on Project Application and Funding Service
cookies.intro_line1: Cookies are files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
cookies.intro_line2: We use cookies to store information about how you use the Project Application and Funding Service website.
cookies.cookie_settings_intro: We use 2 types of cookie. You can choose which cookies you're happy for us to use.
cookies.strictly_necessary_intro: These essential cookies do things like remember your progress through a form.
cookies.session_purpose: Allows you to log in and manage your account
cookies.prefs_purpose: Lets us know whether you've already set your cookies preferences
cookies.policy_purpose: Lets us know what your cookies preferences are
cookies.analytics_heading: Third party cookies that measure website use (analytics)
cookies.analytics_intro: We use Google Analytics to measure how you use the website so we can improve it based on user needs. We do not allow Google to use or share the data about how you use this site.
cookies.analytics_para: Google Analytics sets cookies that store anonymised information about:
cookies.analytics_bullet1: how you got to the site
cookies.analytics_bullet2: the pages you visit on the Project Application and Funding Service, and how long you spend on each page
cookies.analytics_bullet3: what you click on while you're visiting the site
cookies.ga_purpose: This helps us count how many people visit the service by tracking if you've visited before
cookies.gid_purpose: This helps us count how many people visit the service by tracking if you've visited before

settings.title: Cookie settings on Project Application and Funding Service
settings.heading: Cookie settings on Project Application and Funding Service
settings.intro_line1: Cookies are files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
settings.description: We use cookies to store information about how you use the Project Application and Funding Service website.
settings.strictly_note: We use 2 types of cookie. You can choose which cookies you're happy for us to use.
settings.strictly_always_on: Strictly necessary cookies are always enabled because they are needed to make the service work.
settings.analytics_question: Do you want to accept analytics cookies?
settings.analytics_hint: Analytics cookies help us improve the service by understanding how it is used.
settings.analytics_yes: Use cookies that measure my website use
settings.analytics_no: Do not use cookies that measure my website use
settings.find_out_more_text: Find out more about cookies on GOV.UK
settings.banner_message: Your cookie preferences have been saved.
settings.strictly_note_short: Strictly necessary cookies are always on.
settings.description_short: You can change which cookies you're happy for us to use.
settings.description_full: We use Google Analytics to measure how you use the website so we can improve it based on user needs. We do not allow Google to use or share the data about how you use this site.
